name: Chng.GitHub.com
body: ### Welcome to Zhicheng Zeng's homepages, z.alex.zeng@gmail.com I am born in Ganzhou, Jiangxi Province, China. And now I am a graduated student in Dalian University of Technology. I am a LinuxC/C++ programmer. My research interests includes wireless access control and wireless network measurement, especially with physical layer information. ### Main Research Project Bing Xian, Zhicheng Zeng, Lei Wang, Brian Peck, and Daji Qiao. CLaWa: Crowdsourced Location Aware Wi-Fi Access Control. We have build a real-time platform to collect the channel state information. With this abundant information from the physical layer, we design location distinction models to enhance the wireless access control security. ### Publications Zhicheng Zeng, Ming Zhu, Hong Yu, Honglian Ma. Minimum Similarity Sampling Scheme for Nystr√∂m Based Spectral Clustering on Large Scale High-Dimensional Data[C]. The 27th International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Other Applications of Applied Intelligent Systems, IEA/AIE. Kaohsiung, Taiwan, 2014, 260-269. Ming Zhu, Zhicheng Zeng, Lei Wang, Zhenquan Qin, An Pan, Yuanyuan Zhang and Lei Shu. A Measurement Study of a Campus Wi-Fi Network with Mixed Handheld and Non-handheld Traffic[C]. The 2015 Canadian Conference on Electrical and Computer Engineering, IEEE CCECE 2015.
